column1: Cafe Ba-Ba-Reeba!////Spain is arguably my favorite country to visit in the world
column2: and some of my fondest memories are of long summer evenings spent tapas-bar-hopping
column3: sipping on vino tinto and noshing on pinxtos of the most incredible flavors
column5: and textures. Spain also has the Mediterranean Sea and its incredibly fresh seafood to draw on...we in Chicago are not quite so fortunate. All of this is a long way of saying that I'm usually satisfied at best with American renditions of tapas. While its impossible to recreate the history
column7: and (dare I say) magic of tapas in Basque country
column8: Cafe Ba-Ba-Reeba does a more than passable translation right in the heart of Lincoln Park.
